00021 #ifndef PARALLELSITECALC_H
00022 #define PARALLELSITECALC_H
00023 
00024 
00025 #include <votca/ctp/qmcalculator.h>
00026 #include <votca/tools/thread.h>
00027 #include <votca/tools/mutex.h>
00028 
00029 
00030 namespace votca { namespace ctp {
00031 
00032 class ParallelSiteCalculator : public QMCalculator
00033 {
00034 
00035 public:
00036 
00037     ParallelSiteCalculator() : _nextSite(NULL) {};
00038    ~ParallelSiteCalculator() {};
00039 
00040     string       Identify() { return "Parallel Site Calculator"; }
00041 
00042     bool         EvaluateFrame(Topology *top);
00043     virtual void InitSlotData(Topology *top) { ; }
00044     virtual void PostProcess(Topology *top) { ; }
00045     virtual void EvalSite(Topology *top, Segment *seg, int slot) { ; }
00046 
00047     Segment     *RequestNextSite(int opId, Topology *top);
00048     void         LockCout() { _coutMutex.Lock(); }
00049     void         UnlockCout() { _coutMutex.Unlock(); }
00050 
00051 
00052     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00053     // Site workers (i.e. individual threads) //
00054     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00055 
00056     class SiteOperator : public Thread
00057     {
00058     public:
00059 
00060         SiteOperator(int id, Topology *top,
00061                      ParallelSiteCalculator *master)
00062                    : _id(id), _top(top), _seg(NULL),
00063                      _master(master)      {};
00064 
00065        ~SiteOperator() {};
00066 
00067         int  getId() { return _id; }
00068         void setId(int id) { _id = id; }
00069 
00070         void Run(void);
00071         
00072 
00073     protected:
00074 
00075         int                      _id;
00076         Topology                *_top;
00077         Segment                 *_seg;
00078         ParallelSiteCalculator  *_master;
00079     };
00080 
00081 
00082 protected:
00083 
00084     vector<Segment*> ::iterator _nextSite;
00085     Mutex                       _nextSiteMutex;
00086     Mutex                       _coutMutex;
00087     
00088 
00089 };
00090 
00091 bool ParallelSiteCalculator::EvaluateFrame(Topology *top) {
00092 
00093     // Rigidify if (a) not rigid yet (b) rigidification at all possible
00094     if (!top->isRigid()) {
00095         bool isRigid = top->Rigidify();
00096         if (!isRigid) { return 0; }
00097     }
00098     else { cout << endl << "... ... System is already rigidified."; }
00099     cout << endl;    
00100 
00101     vector<SiteOperator*> siteOps;
00102     this->InitSlotData(top);
00103 
00104     _nextSite = top->Segments().begin();
00105 
00106     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
00107         SiteOperator *newOp = new SiteOperator(id, top, this);
00108         siteOps.push_back(newOp);
00109     }
00110 
00111     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
00112         siteOps[id]->Start();
00113     }
00114 
00115     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
00116         siteOps[id]->WaitDone();
00117     }
00118 
00119     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
00120         delete siteOps[id];
00121     }
00122 
00123     siteOps.clear();
00124 
00125     this->PostProcess(top);
00126     return 1;
00127 }
00128 
00129 
00130 // +++++++++++++++++ //
00131 // Thread Management //
00132 // +++++++++++++++++ //
00133 
00134 Segment *ParallelSiteCalculator::RequestNextSite(int opId, Topology *top) {
00135 
00136     _nextSiteMutex.Lock();
00137 
00138     Segment *workOnThis;
00139 
00140     if (_nextSite == top->Segments().end()) {
00141         workOnThis = NULL;
00142     }
00143     else {
00144         workOnThis = *_nextSite;
00145         _nextSite++;
00146     }
00147 
00148     _nextSiteMutex.Unlock();
00149 
00150     return workOnThis;
00151 }
00152 
00153 
00154 
00155 // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00156 // SiteOperator Member Functions //
00157 // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00158 
00159 void ParallelSiteCalculator::SiteOperator::Run(void) {
00160 
00161     while (true) {
00162 
00163         Segment *seg = _master->RequestNextSite(_id, _top);
00164 
00165         if (seg == NULL) { break; }
00166         else { this->_master->EvalSite(_top, seg, _id); }
00167     }
00168 }
00169 
00170 
00171 }}
